definition.name: frenkel_integral_corrected
definition.definition: Frenkel's integral representation (CORRECTED). For density operators rho, sigma (trace 1, full rank): D(rho||sigma) = integral_1^infty [E_gamma(rho||sigma)/gamma + E_gamma(sigma||rho)/gamma^2] dgamma (FR). For unnormalised reference tau >= 0, Tr[tau]=c>0, omega:=tau/c: D(rho||tau) = integral_{1/c}^infty E_beta(rho||tau)/beta dbeta + integral_c^infty E_beta(tau||rho)/beta^2 dbeta - log(c) (FR-c). Setting tau=1_A x rho_B, c=d_A: D(rho_AB||1_A x rho_B) = integral_{1/d_A}^infty E_beta(rho_AB||tau)/beta dbeta + integral_{d_A}^infty E_beta(tau||rho_AB)/beta^2 dbeta - log(d_A) (FR-bip). Reference: Liu-Hirche-Cheng (2025) arXiv:2507.07065v2.
